IOC Member Leaves 
    Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Chang Ung, member of the International Olympic Committee and president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, left here Friday after participating in the Pyongyang torch relay event for the 29th Olympic Games.
